name.text: 8th Philippine SME Business Expo & Conference 2019
name.html: 8th Philippine SME Business Expo & Conference 2019

description.text:
The Philippine SME Business Expo & Conference [PHILSME] is the country's leading Business-2-Business Tradeshow, Conference and Networking Event for Small and Medium Enterprises (SMEs).
The 8th Philippine SME Business Expo & Conference will be held from May 02-03, 2019 at the SMX Convention Center Manila, Mall of Asia Complex, Pasay City, Metro Manila.
Now in its 8th edition, PHILSME will feature over 120 Business Solutions and Business Opportunities in over 1,815 sqm exhibit space and expects over 10,000 visitors. 
This 2-day event will also provide information on the latest innovations and trends presented in an interactive program composed of seminars, forums, workshops, product presentations and other activities that provide growth opportunities enabling SMEs to be competitive in the Philippines and the ASEAN region. 
Alongside the expo, a 2-day interactive business conference will be also held to provide the latest tips, trends, and innovations on how to boost Sales, Marketing, Talent Acquisition, Leadership, Digital Innovation, Business Development, Management and many more, led by Philippines’ top industry experts.

WHO SHOULD ATTEND?
Small and Medium size Business Owners + Entrepreneurs + Aspiring Entrepreneurs + Start-Ups + Directors + Managers + Business Professionals + Interested Franchisees + Businessmen + Investors + Academics + Returning OFWs + Trade Association Members + Government Officers + Media and Press

INTERESTED TO EXHIBIT?

Email: sunshine@philsme.com

INTERESTED TO ATTEND THE CONFERENCE?

Email: conference@philsme.com

Phone:  02-218-9517  |  02-266-0092

Mobile: 0927-395-1575 | 0928-732-5557

Website: www.philsme.com   

Facebook: www.facebook.com/PhilippineSMEBusinessExpo

THIS EVENT IS ORGANISED BY MEDIACOM SOLUTIONS INC.

name.text: RISE Weekend Dallas - July 18-20, 2019
name.html: RISE Weekend Dallas - July 18-20, 2019

description.text:
RISE Weekend is happening in Dallas, TX from July 18th-20th, 2019! RISE Weekend is a multi-day personal growth conference created and led by Rachel Hollis. RISE Weekend is an event where women from every walk of life can come together to be inspired, supported and enveloped in a community. 
Expect to be energized and motivated. Expect to cry and make new friends. Expect to reconnect with those dreams and goals you’ve been carrying around for years, without any idea of what to do with them. Expect to be inspired to RISE!
Thursday, July 18th - 9am - 4pm - Add onto your RISE Weekend experience by purchasing the extra, and optional Health & Wellness Day. This day is all about owning your PRESENT. How are the choices you are making RIGHT NOW with your mental + physical health helping or hurting you develop into a better version of you? Health & Wellness Day tickets are sold separately.
Friday, July 19th - 10am - 5pm - The first day of RISE Weekend will be all about owning your PAST. You can’t get to the next step in your life without acknowledging where you’ve come from.
Saturday, July 20th - 10am - 5pm - The next day is about owning your FUTURE. Now that you know what you’ve walked through, learn how that can make you a warrior for who you are about to become.
We love to end our events with an epic Dance Party and our favorite DJ! Please note - Dance Party tickets are sold separately and must be purchased with either a RISE Weekend or Health & Wellness Day ticket.
For a list of our event FAQs, check them out HERE.

name.text: 6th Entrepreneur and Franchise Expo 2019
name.html: 6th Entrepreneur and Franchise Expo 2019

description.text:
The Entrepreneur and Franchise Expo [EFE] is Philippines’ No. 1 trade & consumer exhibition and networking event featuring hundreds of Franchise Businesses and Small & Medium Enterprises (SMEs), to be held on July 19-21, 2019 at the Megatrade Hall, SM Megamall, Mandaluyong City. 
Now in its 6th year, find hundreds of franchise concepts, as well as new business opportunities and solutions, to be attended by 10,000 visitors.
If you are interested to exhibit or to be a sponsor send an email to Elvis Elorde at elvis@efe.ph or call +6325094792, +639273951575.
Share your event posts on social media with the hashtag #efeph and get a chance to win exciting prizes!
Website: www.efe.ph
Facebook: /efeph
Instagram: /efeph
Email: elvis@efe.ph
Mobile: +639273951575
Phone: +6325094792
The Entrepreneur and Franchise Expo is organized by Mediacom Solutions Inc. (www.mediacom.ph)

name.text: Curso SER & ESTAR e-learning
name.html: Curso SER & ESTAR e-learning

description.html:
Para iniciar a carreira na rede CENTURY 21 é realizado o Curso SER&ESTAR. A participação neste curso (formação inicial) é o primeiro contacto com o Sistema CENTURY 21, nomeadamente com os objetivos, visão, missão, valores, história, elementos e método da maior Rede Imobiliária do Mundo.

Inscreva-se no SER & ESTAR em E-LEARNING e aprenda de forma mais flexível e interativa o Sistema CENTURY 21, nomeadamente o posicionamento da Marca como fator de diferenciação no mercado e a importância da Cultura Empresarial e dos procedimentos na construção do sucesso comercial na esfera imobiliária.

  • Destinatários: Toda a Rede CENTURY 21
  • Modalidade: E-learning
  • Preço: Gratuito

Procedimentos e informações:

  1. Preencha a ficha de inscrição
  2. A Coordenação da Agência recebe e partilha consigo o utilizador e respetiva password para o acesso à Plataforma (enviado pela plataforma à 3ªf e 5ªf);
  3. Após a receção do utilizador e respetiva password pela Coordenação, o formando tem 7 dias para frequentar o Curso;
  4. Quando aceder aos conteúdos do Curso SER & ESTAR CENTURY 21 encontrará uma formação interativa que irá possibilitar o acesso a informação, realização de exercícios práticos, visualização de vídeos, consulta de conceitos no Glossário e de documentos na Biblioteca e ainda o acesso a botões “Saber +”;
  5. Após concluir o ponto anterior, é solicitado que realize um teste de conhecimentos, sendo que tem três tentativas para o realizar. Para efeitos de avaliação e certificação conta a nota mais alta, sendo que para obter sucesso é necessário obter uma classificação igual ou superior a 50%;
  6. A frequência e a conclusão do Curso SER & ESTAR CENTURY 21 com sucesso é obrigatória para obter o seu e-mail gratuito century21.pt e ter acesso ao CRM 21Online.

name.text: Making Money
name.html: Making Money

description.text:
Making Money
From a school teacher to hawking clothes, Banice founded the multi-million shillings’ chain of clothes stores, Jade Collections, with branches in Kisumu, Eldoret, Thika and various outlets in Nairobi. In her own admission, Banice does not pursue money, she pursues her passion. When we stop chasing the wrong things, we begin to attract the right things.
On Wednesday the 17th April 2019 from 6pm to 8pm at KICC, Banice will share with us her business journey in our annual conference dubbed, Making Money.
On the panel, we’ll also have Simon Kabu share with us how he journeyed from a tout to the founder of Bonfire Adventures. That Simon is obsessed with travel is not in doubt. Indeed, he met his wife and business partner Sarah in an excursion at Lukenya and they both realized they have an insatiable passion for travel. Simon and Sarah will be sharing with us nuggets of wisdom on how to establish a business of global influence. I work with Bonfire Adventures for our high-seas cruises and their standards are beyond description.
Graciously, my dear friend Tabitha Karanja will also join us to help us move to the next level: from an SME to a multi-billion corporate business. And as many of you know, I have had unprecedented breakthrough in corporate training and conference speaking around the world and I’ll equally inspire those in consultancy on taking their business game to the global stage.
This business conference is 100% FREE OF CHARGE. But for logistical and security reasons, we require everyone who desires to attend this conference to register by Friday 12th April 5pm through this link…
https://makingmoneywithdrkn.eventbrite.com
WE WILL NOT ALLOW anyone who has not registered into this business conference. Come along with your note-book and printed or e-ticket for clearance at the info desk from 5pm on the D-Day to avoid the long queues in our annual conferences.
0722533053 / 0733640790
Thanks,Dr. Kinyanjui Nganga.

name.text: Entrepreneur University - The Founder Summit
name.html: Entrepreneur University - The Founder Summit

description.text:
Bist du Unternehmer oder willst einer werden?
Interessierst Du dich für Online Marketing, Vertrieb, Unternehmermindset und Startup-Gründung?
Hast Du die Nase voll vom "normalen, durchschnittlichen" Leben? 
Willst Du dich endlich mit Gleichgesinnten umgeben? Willst Du von den erfolgreichsten Gründern und Experten Deutschlands lernen und eine unvergleichliche Business-Konferenz erleben, die Deutschland so noch nie gesehen hat?
The Founder Summit 2018 war #nextlevelshit. Mike Tyson, Sadhguru, Saygin Yalcin und mehr als 30 weitere Speaker sind dabei gewesen und haben ein Wochenende kreiert, welches den Teilnehmern noch lange im Gedächtnis bleibt.


The Founder Summit 2019 wird #biggerandbetter!
WAS DICH ERWARTET: Bis ins letzte Detail haben wir jedes einzelne Feedback ausgewertet und unser Eventkonzept noch weiter auf deine Bedürfnisse angepasst. Du wirst Teil des größten und spektakulärsten Events im Bereich Startups, Entrepreneurship and Personal Development Deutschlands!15.000 m² Area,  6.000 Participants, 65 Speaker, 8 Theme-Stages, Center Stage, Live Pitch Club, Big Final Party and many more!  
Zum unschlagbaren Preis von 99€ erhältst Du ALLES, was Du benötigst, um Deine Unternehmerkarriere auf das nächste Level zu heben.


Du erfährst die Geheimnisse und Tricks der besten Unternehmer Deutschlands.


Du bekommst Strategien und Taktiken direkt aus der Praxis in den Bereichen Online Marketing, Sales, Startup, Mindset, Entrepreneurship und Financial Freedom.


Du netzwerkst 2 Tage lang mit den besten und ambitioniertesten Gründern, Studenten und Investoren Deutschlands.


Neben all dem Business-Content erlebst Du ein unvergleichliches Wochenende mit Show-Acts, Party, und vielem mehr.


Du wirst Teil der schnellst wachsenden Entrepreneurship und Personal Development Community Deutschlands.


Du hast die Möglichkeit Dich direkt vor Ort mit deinen Vorbildern über deine individuellen Themen auszutauschen und Fragen zu stellen.


Uns ist ganz wichtig zu betonen, dass unser Event keines der folgenden Dinge ist:


Es ist keine Verkaufsveranstaltung. Bei uns dreht sich alles um das Thema Content. Wie können wir Dich voranbringen?


Es ist kein Motivations-Tschaka-Tschaka. Unsere Speaker kennen Ihr Handwerk und gehören zu den Besten in Ihrem Fach.


Es ist kein eintöniger, langweiliger Kongress, bei dem Du während der Vorträge einschläfst.


Bist Du bereit, deine Unternehmerkarriere auf das "Next Level" zu heben?
Bist Du bereit an nur einem Wochenende so viel zu lernen und so viele hochwertige neue Kontakte zu knüpfen, wie nirgendwo anders im deutschsprachigen Raum?
Bist Du bereit für "The Founder Summit 2019"?
Sichere Dir jetzt dein Ticket und werde Teil eines unvergesslichen Wochenendes.
Die Ticketpreise sind (noch) unverschämt günstig. Also sichere Dir dein Ticket JETZT!
2017 war geil.
2018 war nextlevelshit.
2019 wird biggerandbetter.

name.text: Jobs Expo Dublin - Saturday 27th April 2019
name.html: Jobs Expo Dublin - Saturday 27th April 2019

description.text:
Jobs Expo is returning to Dublin! Jobs Expo Dublin will be held at Croke Park's Cusack Suite on Saturday 27th April 2019 (10am-4pm). Jobs Expo Dublin will feature hundreds of active job opportunities at home and abroad and is the only careers exhibition of its type to feature FREE ADMISSION.
What can you expect at Jobs Expo Dublin?
* Employers actively recruiting for hundreds of jobs at home and abroad* Specialised areas dedicated to jobs in particular industries* Educational experts offering advice on upskilling, part-time and evening courses, and third-level courses* Start your own business experts offering advice and support networks* The Career Clinic offering one-to-one CV, job seeking and career advice from professional career guidance counsellors* A packed seminar timetable on important and topical issues by a range of industry expertsJob Expo Dublin also includes dedicated areas include:
* The Jobs Lab – medtech and STEM jobs* The Digital City – opportunities for computer and IT specialists* The Mall – jobs in sales, retail and related areas* Go Global – career opportunities overseas* The Campus – education, training and upskilling opportunities* The Building Site – opportunities in construction, engineering and related tradesIn addition, Jobs Expo will also include a general jobs area with employers that do not fall into any of the above categories.
Career Clinic
The Career Clinic offers the chance for attendees to meet with professional development coaches. They can help candidates with crucial issues such as interview skills, CV presentation and changing career direction.
Agenda Stage
Jobs Expo Dublin's Agenda Stage will host talks on a variety of topics including jobseeking skills such as using social media to land your dream job and interview techniques as well as a CV writing workshop. Other seminars include talks by industry insiders on a variety of career topics.

Privacy / Terms & Conditions
Your privacy is important to use and we will never sell, rent or give away your personal information you give us. When you register to attend an event you’ll be asked to choose your preferences in hearing from us again. Read our Privacy Policy here and Terms & Conditions here. 
Normally we take photos and video at our events which may be used for our own promotional use (social media, website) and your registration confirms your consent to this use. If you object to this just let us know on the day of the event and we will take steps to ensure your preference is respected.
Wondering if you have the right to work in Ireland? 
You'll find the answer here.
All the best, 
The Jobs Expo Team

name.text: Techarenan Summit
name.html: Techarenan Summit

description.text:
Techarenan Summit - Entrepreneurship & Innovation
Meet Sweden’s and the Nordics’ most prominent startup & growth companies and join entrepreneurs, business leaders, politicians and investors in discussing entrepreneurship, innovation and future technologies.
(Live translation, Swedish to English, will be available at the conference)
 

Program
09:20 - Registration and coffeeMain Stage
Session 1, 10:00 - 12:25


Opening Ceremony
Leading Through Transformation
Tap Into the Global Talent Pool
Global Changes Affecting Swedish Tech Companies


Session 2, 13:00 - 16:20

Thinking Big and Building Global
The Investor 2.0 – Investing for Impact
How to Market to the New Generation
Design to Conquer the World
Leveraging New Technologies for Sustainability


Stage 2
Break Out Sessions 10:20 - 13:30

The Art of Raising Capital
Cyber Security
Competitive Design

Full schedule will be posted on the conference website
On Stage


Susanna Najafi, Founder, BackingMinds
Jacob de Geer, Founder, iZettle
Hélène Barnekow, CEO, Microsoft Sweden
Annie Lööf, Leader of Centerpartiet
Kaaren Hilsen, CEO, Telenor Sweden
Konrad Bergström, Founder, X Shore
Jonas Gustavsson, CEO, ÅF
Saeid Esmaeilzadeh, Founder, Serendipity
Jan Erik Solem, Founder, Mapillary
Jan-Olof Jacke, CEO, Svenskt Näringsliv
Fredrik Wester, Founder, Paradox Interactive
Katarina Berg, Global HR Director, Spotify
Stefan Ytterborn, Founder, Cake and POC
Petra Einarsson, CEO, Billerud Korsnäs
Lotta Lyrå, CEO, Clas Ohlson
Fredrik Hjelm, Founder, VOI
Anna Felländer, Founder, AI Sustainability Center
Emma Wiklund, Founder, Emma S.
Sophia Bendz, Partner, Atomico
Annika Winsth, Chief Economist, Nordea
Pär Heyden, Head of Brand, Polestar
Sara Wimmercranz, Founder, BackingMinds
Susanna Campbell, Chief Investment Officer, Norrsken
Carl-Johan Karlsson, Director, EKN
Anders Fast, Managing Director, Baker McKenzie
Örjan Frid, CEO, Eniro
Andreas Säfström, Head of Industrial Design, Ericsson
Plus more...



+ More to come

 

NEW: Executive Intro Program - For entrepreneurs
As attending entrepreneur you have the possibility to sign up for the Executive Intro Program. It is an opportunity to book a one on one meeting with Executive-level management from large industrial Players and experts. The purpose of the program is to discuss business ideas, POCs, collaborations and get vital input to your innovations and applications. 
The Executive Intro program will open March 24th.
 
  
About The Techarena
Techarenan/Serendipity Challenge is an annual entrepreneurship competition and tech exhibition open to all Nordic startup and growth companies. The platform and community are fueling innovation and aims at acknowledge leading start-ups and growth companies as a significant and decisive force in how our future will look like.
The paradigm shift we are facing right now is unprecedented. Who acts on it will determine the key players of the next century’s technological transformation. Join the discussion that gathers both impressive entrepreneurial minds and global business leaders. Listen to inspirational speakers and gain new perspectives while building relationships with some of the most disruptive startup & growth companies. 
 

Who's coming?
You will meet around 4.000 visitors attending the conference, foremost industry representatives, entrepreneurs, tech evangelists, Swedish and international investors, partners and media. 
For questions contact: omid@sdip.se

 
Personal data
The personal data you provide in connection with the inquiry of the event, e.g. Your email address is used to administer your event order. It may also be used for marketing activities for upcoming events hosted by Techarenan. Furthermore, you can also be contacted by Serendipity Communications for similar events and offers that we think may interest you. We will save your data up to three(3) years. 

Techarenan reserves the right to withdraw or revoke tickets if the attendee does not submit sufficient data so that Techarenan can identify the attendee.
You acknowledge and understand that the Ticket is a revocable license to attend the Techarenam for which it was issued, which is subject to revocation and denial of admission without compensation for any reason, including, but not limited to, your attempted or actual violation of any of the rules set forth herein, policy or regulations and for any other action taken by You in violation of any local, state or federal law, or that may endanger other Ticket Holders.
Terms and Conditions
Terms of service
Privacy policy

name.text: The Design Experience 2019
name.html: The Design Experience 2019

description.text:
Archiproducts Milano 2019: The New Design Experience 

The Design Experience is now in its fourth edition, and has become a fundamental rendezvous for anyone in Milan during Design Week. Thousands of professionals from the world over flock to the Via Tortona location during the Fuorisalone – the allure? The plethora of installations, immersive experiences and exhibition itineraries breaching the borders where design and its collateral worlds meet, blend and overlap. The Archiproducts Milano space prepares to play host by donning a new layout, welcoming professionals in a design set that counts over 50 international brands. 
Among the protagonists of the 2019 edition, members of Truly Design are ready to draw visitors of Via Tortona 31 into a playful and mind-bending anamorphic installation designed for Volkswagen, the main sponsors of Archiproducts Milano for the second year running.
Moving up to the venue’s first floor, visitors are welcomed into the BTicino home: Living Now Apartment, designed by the Marcante Testa studio. The interior arrangement here dialogues fluidly with technology, in a perfect symbiosis between innovation and design. 

*************

Alla quarta edizione, The Design Experience è un appuntamento irrinunciabile all’interno del palinsesto della design week milanese. Durante il Fuorisalone, migliaia di professionisti da ogni parte del mondo gravitano attorno alle location di Zona Tortona, per assistere ad installazioni, esperienze immersive e percorsi espositivi che esplorano contaminazioni tra design e mondi collaterali. Per l’occasione, gli spazi di Archiproducts Milano si preparano a vestire un nuovo layout e ad accogliere migliaia di progettisti in un set design che conta la partecipazione di oltre 50 brand internazionali.
Anche quest'anno la facciata sarà affidata a Kriskadecor: centinaia di leggerissime catene in alluminio disegneranno il nuovo volto del building, secondo la scenografia scandita dal ritmo delle grafiche dello studio torinese Truly Design.
I creativi di Truly Design sono pronti a coinvolgere i visitatori di via Tortona 31 con un’installazione anamorfica progettata per Volkswagen, main sponsor di Archiproducts Milano per il secondo anno consecutivo.
Salendo al primo piano della location, si viene accolti in casa BTicino: Living Now Apartment è lo spazio progettato dallo studio Marcante Testa in cui l’allestimento dialoga con la tecnologia, in perfetto equilibrio tra innovazione e design.

MAIN SPONSOR
Volkswagen

description.html:
Archiproducts Milano 2019: The New Design Experience 


The Design Experience is now in its fourth edition, and has become a fundamental rendezvous for anyone in Milan during Design Week. Thousands of professionals from the world over flock to the Via Tortona location during the Fuorisalone – the allure? The plethora of installations, immersive experiences and exhibition itineraries breaching the borders where design and its collateral worlds meet, blend and overlap. The Archiproducts Milano space prepares to play host by donning a new layout, welcoming professionals in a design set that counts over 50 international brands. 

Among the protagonists of the 2019 edition, members of Truly Design are ready to draw visitors of Via Tortona 31 into a playful and mind-bending anamorphic installation designed for Volkswagen, the main sponsors of Archiproducts Milano for the second year running.

Moving up to the venue’s first floor, visitors are welcomed into the BTicino home: Living Now Apartment, designed by the Marcante Testa studio. The interior arrangement here dialogues fluidly with technology, in a perfect symbiosis between innovation and design. 


*************


Alla quarta edizione, The Design Experience è un appuntamento irrinunciabile all’interno del palinsesto della design week milanese. Durante il Fuorisalone, migliaia di professionisti da ogni parte del mondo gravitano attorno alle location di Zona Tortona, per assistere ad installazioni, esperienze immersive e percorsi espositivi che esplorano contaminazioni tra design e mondi collaterali. Per l’occasione, gli spazi di Archiproducts Milano si preparano a vestire un nuovo layout e ad accogliere migliaia di progettisti in un set design che conta la partecipazione di oltre 50 brand internazionali.

Anche quest'anno la facciata sarà affidata a Kriskadecor: centinaia di leggerissime catene in alluminio disegneranno il nuovo volto del building, secondo la scenografia scandita dal ritmo delle grafiche dello studio torinese Truly Design.

I creativi di Truly Design sono pronti a coinvolgere i visitatori di via Tortona 31 con un’installazione anamorfica progettata per Volkswagen, main sponsor di Archiproducts Milano per il secondo anno consecutivo.

Salendo al primo piano della location, si viene accolti in casa BTicino: Living Now Apartment è lo spazio progettato dallo studio Marcante Testa in cui l’allestimento dialoga con la tecnologia, in perfetto equilibrio tra innovazione e design.

name.text: Kids Building Wisconsin 2019
name.html: Kids Building Wisconsin 2019

description.text:
Kids Building Wisconsin 2019 is May 11, 2019 at McKee Frms Park in Fitchburg, WI.  Kids Building Wisconsin is an educational and fun event to inspire and encourage kids’ interest in construction. Kids Building Wisconsin is a 100% free event (with the exception of food) and open to the public. At Kids Building Wisconsin, we have big construction equipment, boom lift rides, and over 40 awesome hands-on exhibits highlighting the many exciting careers in the construction industry.
When regsistering make sure you select one ticket per person (including children)

FAQs 
Why do I need to register for Kids Building Wisconsin if it is a free event?
Kids Building Wisconsin does involve big construction equipment and other activities that have a certain degree of risk. Is KBW dangerous? Not at all but the lawyers say we need this and also we like to have contact information in case an emergency would happen.
Anyway, please make sure when pre-registering the you get 1 ticket per person including each kids you plan on attending with you.

Why pre-register for Kids Building Wisconsin?
Simple answer, so you do not have to fill out this form the day of the event. Do you need to pre-register? Nope, we have registering available at the vent also but we encourage it!

How many tickets do I need to get?
When pre-registering the you get 1 ticket per person including each kids you plan on attending with you.

What are my transportation/parking options for getting to and from the event?
Parking has always been an issue at Kids Building Wisconsin and we are working with the City of Fitchburg to make it easier.  WE WILL HAVE VERY LIMITED PARKING AT McKEE FARMS PARK!  Additionally in the past we have had extra parking at local businesses with a shuttle.  The City of Fitchburg is not allowing street parking for the event for emergency vehicle access.  We will update new parking information on our Facebook page.

Last year the pre-registration line took forever, have you fixed that?
Thats why pre-registration is done on EventBright now.  The pre-resgustration line process will be very fast now.  Just show your printed out code or code on the app and you are in.
 
How can I contact the organizer with any questions?
Yes, please feel free to message us on Facebook or by sending an e-mail to info@kidsbuildingwi.org
 
Do I have to bring my printed ticket to the event?
You do not have to but we highly suggest that you do to keep the line moving faster.  Either a printed ticket or the Evetbright app on your phone.
 
Are food and drinks free as well?
Food and drink at Kids Building Wisconsin are not free. Roman Candle will be on site selling pizza, hot dogs and other items.

What is the best time of the day to attend?
Afternoon!   Kids Building Wisconsin is traditionally the busiest from 9:00 AM to about 1:00 PM.

Conference Overview:
 The SME Digital Tech 4.0 Conference is for senior level executives interested in developing their digital technology strategies for their Business. Industry 4.0 as a change catalyst will transform how products and services are designed, manufactured, marketed and used. It will change the way people live and bring significant impact to any SME business.
The SME Digital Tech 4.0 Conference is essential for those dynamic business leaders keen to gain knowledge on the digital transformation for their business.
The Theme this year is “Kick-start Your Digital Transformation”

Many SMEs have registered themselves for the SME Digital Tech 4.0 Conference. WHY?:
In the Malaysian SME Masterplan 2012-2020, it is projected that by 2020, SMEs will contribute 62% to employment, 42% to national GDP and 25% to Malaysia’s exports.
However from the 2017 results, SMEs in Malaysia have fallen short in productivity. They are contributing 66% to employment, but 37.1% to national GDP and 17.1% to exports.
 These gaps need to be closed to ensure Malaysia’s transition to a high-income economy. The SME Digital Tech 4.0 Conference and the SME Conference Series was developed to address this gap. Furthermore, to assist the SME, the government has in Budget 2019, RM14.73B allocated in LOANS AND GRANTS for SME Digital Technology Transformation.

VIEW EVENT BROCHURE HERE

name.text: Small Business Expo 2019 - NEW YORK CITY
name.html: Small Business Expo 2019 - NEW YORK CITY

description.text:
WHAT IS SMALL BUSINESS EXPO?
Small Business Expo is America’s BIGGEST & most anticipated business-to-business networking event, trade show & conference for business owners, entrepreneurs, start-ups, decision-makers or anyone who works for a small business or is interested in starting a Small Business.  
Small Business Expo is a FREE one-day event to attend for small businesses to network, build new business relationships, participate in cutting-edge and business-building workshops/seminars, exchange ideas, shop for new vendors and learn from leading industry experts. If you are serious about starting or growing your business, Small Business Expo is a "MUST ATTEND" event for you.  Hosted in 17 major cities across the Country, Small Business Expo is the #1 Business to Business Networking Event dedicated to helping Small Business Owners take their business to the next level.
 
WHAT IS THE COST TO ATTEND?

It's FREE TO ATTEND!
There are upgraded premium badges that include benefits like Reserved Seating, Lead Scanner, Beer & Biz Happy Hour Bar & other perks (see below Badge Chart).
If you would like to be a Sponsor or Exhibit at Small Business Expo, please call us at 212.404.2345 or VISIT OUR EXHIBITOR INFO PAGE. 

WHY ATTEND?

Network with thousands of businesses, entrepreneurs & start-ups
Attend 25+ Business workshops & seminars to help your business grow
Fast-paced speed-networking sessions to make new contacts quickly
Learn about new cutting-edge products and services
Establish hundreds of new & valuable contacts
Interact with the movers and shakers of your industry.
Leave the show with a wide array of qualified and targeted sales leads  

WHO CAN ATTEND?

Any qualifying participant (i.e., not a minor) can attend Small Business Expo. We encourage anyone that currently operates/owns a small business or anyone that works for a small business to attend.
If you don't currently own a small business or work for a small business, that's okay too! Small Business Expo is the perfect place for you to come learn how to start & grow your own business. We have FREE workshops & seminars about building your own business, an exhibitor hall with great products/services to help you, speed networking & more!
Whether you are already an established business, a start-up, a Fortune 100 or anything in between, if you love small business, we want to see you at Small Business Expo.

 
YOUR BADGE OPTIONS:
WANT TO EXHIBIT YOUR PRODUCT/SERVICE & GET SALES LEADS?
If your product/service targets business owners, exhibiting at this show is a must. Many business owners attend Small Business Expo to shop for innovative products & services that will help their business grow. Nowhere else can you reach thousands of business owners and potentially make on-the-spot sales in one day!  
For more info, call us at 212.404.2345 or VISIT OUR EXHIBITOR INFO PAGE.

name.html: Palestra Beneficente - Gestão do Tempo e das Emoções - Callônego - São Leopoldo /RS

description.text:
Palestra Beneficente - Gestão do Tempo e das Emoções - Lucas Calônego

Nossa palestra será sobre gestão do tempo e das emoções, onde temos como objetivo auxiliar as pessoas a gerenciarem seu tempo de forma mais produtiva, para assim aumentar sua qualidade de vida e a gerenciar suas emoções, para assim poder manter seu equilíbrio em momentos de pico emocional.
 Nesta palestra é utilizada ferramentas de gestão do tempo e produtividade e ensinada uma teoria-prática para controle emocional que criei (com papel e caneta, sem custo algum)
  
O QUE VOCÊ IRÁ APRENDER NESTA PALESTRA

Como não ser mais uma Ferrari a 40km/h
Entender o que impede você de produzir no mínimo, 2x mais
Entender o que impede você de enriquecer
Como controlar suas emoções (focar em ansiedade)
Aprender como tomar decisões estratégicas

name.text: connect-ec 2019 / connect Messe
name.html: connect-ec 2019 / connect Messe

description.text:
Deutschlands erste Telekommunikationsmesse

Telekommunikation zündet mit 5G die nächste Tech- nologiestufe. Smartphones werden immer leistungsfä- higer und unsere Autos zur Kommunikationszentrale. Elektromobilität und autonomes Fahren weisen uns in Zukunft den Weg. Die connect-ec bietet eine Platt- form, auf der sich ein breites Fachpublikum und inter- essierte Endverbraucher zu neuen Technologien aus- tauschen und informieren können. In Dresden wird Telekommunikation und Vernetzung für jeden anfassbar. Seien Sie dabei!
Samstag und Sonntag stehen ganz im Zeichen von Anfassen und Ausprobieren! Hier öffnet die connect-ec die Tore für alle Besucher. Lernen Sie das erste faltbare Smartphone und 5G-Smartphones kennen. Erfahren Sie zudem alles über die neusten Smart-Home-Produkte oder nehmen Sie an einem Workshop zum Thema Smartphone-Fotografie mit Colorfoto-Chefredakteur Werner Lüttgens teil. 
Erleben Sie außerdem die Speerspitze vernetzter Autos und Elektromobilität. Unter anderem ist eine Aktion zum Thema „elektrisch fahren“ geplant, bei der man Elektroautos erproben kann. Intermodalität mit E-Bikes, Flugtaxis, Bahn und Nahverkehr ist ein weiterer Schwerpunkt der Messe.

Für mehr Informationen klicken Sie hier www.connect-ec.info

Öffnungszeiten:Samstag, 10 - 18 UhrSonntag, 10 - 17 Uhr

name.text: FREE Six Sigma Yellow Belt - on-line certification class
name.html: FREE Six Sigma Yellow Belt - on-line certification class

description.text:
FREE Six Sigma Yellow Belt




Overview




The Six Sigma Yellow Belt course is tailored to help anyone interested to know what Six Sigma is; learn key concepts in Six Sigma; and to get a basic understanding of how Six Sigma framework works in delivering successful projects. This course is included as a part of Free Lifetime Primary Membership. Once the course is completed, the student needs to take an assessment to get the certificate. The purpose of the exam is to confirm you have basic understanding of Six Sigma.




Certification Exam Format





Multiple Choice
40 questions for the exam
One mark awarded for every right answer
No negative marks for wrong answers
60 minutes duration
28 questions need to be answered correctly to pass
Online un-proctored exam





Audience Profile




Anyone interested in knowing more about Six Sigma can take up this course and exam for free.




Prerequisites




There is no formal prerequisite for this course.

Upon successful completion of the above Six Sigma Yellow Belt e-learning class and passing on-line examination with e-certificate, participants can claim 1 professional development point toward maintenance of your CPIM/ CFPIM/ CSCP/ CLTD designation for passing the examination with this optional physical certificate of completion (chargeable for shipping and handling cost).

name.text: 18º Encuentro Nacional Retailer
name.html: 18º Encuentro Nacional Retailer

description.text:
En el 18vo Encuentro Nacional Retailer y Retail Day 2019 se reunirán los principales referentes de la industria y las cadenas de retail a nivel local y regional, como también distintas personalidades referidas a la alimentación, bebidas, tecnología, software, servicio, TIC, equipamiento, logística y distribución nacional en todos sus formatos. Estarán todos concentrados en un solo día, en el Centro de Exposiciones y Convenciones  (CEC) de Buenos Aires, con el objetivo de relacionarse, capacitarse y hacer más y mejores negocios.
 
Preguntas frecuentes
¿Hay requisitos de identificación o edad para ingresar al evento?
Los hay. Para asistir al Retail Day 2019 debe ser mayor de edad y ser miembro de una empresa. Por este motivo, la inscripción debe ser con mail corporativo.
¿Cómo puedo comunicarme con el organizador si tengo preguntas?
A través de nuestro mail info@retail.com.ar o nuestro teléfono 49586684 (lunes a viernes de 9 a 17). 
¿Debo llevar mi entrada impresa al evento?
En el momento del registro se ofrecen dos opciones: imprimir su entrada o retirarla el día del evento. De elegir la segunda opción, deberá llevar el código de adquisición que ofrece el sitio una vez acreditado.

name.text: MMA Impact Forum Brasil 2019
name.html: MMA Impact Forum Brasil 2019

description.text:
The mobile phone has forever changed the interaction between consumers and brands delivering a closer, personal, powerful and pervasive marketing platform. Brands have the opportunity to leverage this once-in-an-era transformation by leading the imperative for marketing change and adopting proven, peer-driven and scientific best practices, without compromise. At MMA Impact Forum Brasil, you will discover what it takes to capture this zeitgeist by enhancing your marketing and mobile efforts to create genuine relationships with your consumers to drive future business growth. With a marketer-led agenda, Impact brings together marketers and experts ready to share tangible takeaways and tactical lessons on how to drive business success. Lock arms with us as we #ShapeTheFuture™ of marketing.
O mobile mudou para sempre a interação entre consumidores e marcas, oferecendo uma plataforma de comunicação mais próxima, pessoal, poderosa e abrangente. As marcas têm a oportunidade de alavancar essa transformação única, liderando essa mudança e adotando melhores práticas comprovadas, sem colocar em risco suas estratégias. No MMA Impact Fórum Brasil, você descobrirá o que é necessário para aproveitar esse momento, aprimorando os esforços de marketing e mobile para criar relacionamentos verdadeiros com seus consumidores e impulsionar o crescimento do mercado. Com uma agenda liderada por anunciantes, o MMA Impact Fórum Brasil reúne profissionais e especialistas para compartilhar aprendizados e lições práticas sobre como transformar o futuro dos negócios. Junte-se a nós. #ShapeTheFuture™️

name.text: PRIDE WOMEN CONFERENCE 2019
name.html: PRIDE WOMEN CONFERENCE 2019

description.text:
The conference aims to outline strategic objectives and actions for the emotional and material wellbeing of the 21st century woman, her family and the society. This in an agenda for women empowerment because an emotionally balanced woman is a dynamo for successful personal achievement, a happy home, well-balanced children and an enhanced society.
The conference will be an interactive one where speakers and audience share their experiences in order to help the modern woman cope with the challenges of work, relationships and family in the 21st Century.

name.text: Church Tech Expo 2019
name.html: Church Tech Expo 2019

description.text:
A FEIRA
A 5ª Church Tech Expo será realizada entre os dias 27 a 29 de junho de 2018 no Centro de Exposições Pro Magno, com as áreas de exposição e congresso ampliadas para receber 15 mil visitantes e 200 empresas. Única na América Latina, a Feira Internacional de Tecnologia, Inovação, Infraestrutura e Soluções para Templos e Igrejas é um ambiente exclusivo onde líderes religiosos e suas equipes encontram em primeira mão os lançamentos para captação de imagens e streaming, projeção, acústica, sonorização, mixagem, produção musical, iluminação, automação, segurança eletrônica e soluções de infraestrutura típicas deste segmento.
Por conta desta exclusividade, membros de centenas de denominações também participam todos os anos das mais de 60 sessões do Congresso, em busca de aprimoramento profissional e de novos caminhos para comunicar suas mensagens com qualidade, dentro e fora dos templos e igrejas. Graças a esta abrangência, a Church Tech Expo revolucionou a maneira como fabricantes, integradores, distribuidoras e consultores se relacionam com templos, igrejas e locais de adoração, tornando-se referência internacional.
